      • getStringDay

        public static java.lang.String getStringDay(int intDayOfMonth,
                                            java.lang.String strMonth,
                                            int intYear)
                                     throws java.text.ParseException,
                                            java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        Gets the current day given a date.
        Parameters:
        intDayOfMonth - The calendar days usually from 1-30
        strMonth - The calendar months. Eg January/March
        intYear - The calendar year. Eg 2015
        Returns:
        The day of the date. Eg "Monday" or "Tuesday"
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - Occurs when a date with "dd/MM/yyyy" cannot be formed
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - Occurs when the day supplied could not be found in the enum Days
